author: Jesse Pound
title: JPMorgan's market guru says shutdowns are working, virus may peak soon and stocks to rebound 40%
description: The market should also get a boost from the "unprecedented monetary and fiscal measures being implemented."
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only). 
The social distancing measures in place around the country are already showing signs of success by one measure, according to a top JPMorgan strategist, and that could lead to the United States economy and stock… [+376 chars]
